words.definition: The ability to guide or direct others.
The drive or reason for doing something.

example.en: The manager gave a speech to motivate the team.
He knows how to delegate responsibilities effectively.

words.definition: A clear idea of what one wants to achieve.
words.arabic_definition: فكرة واضحة عما يريد الشخص تحقيقه.

example.en: The CEO shared her vision for the company.

words.definition: Working together to achieve a goal.
An experienced person who guides others.

example.en: He acts as a mentor to new team members.

words.definition: The ability to assess and start things independently.
words.arabic_definition: القدرة على تقييم وبدء الأمور بشكل مستقل.

example.en: Her initiative inspired the whole team.
The manager offered support during challenging times.
example.ar: قدم المدير الدعم أثناء الأوقات الصعبة.

words.definition: Belief in the reliability or ability of someone.
words.arabic_definition: الإيمان بموثوقية أو قدرة شخص ما.

example.en: Trust is the foundation of teamwork.
